<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[90, 410, 388, 426]]<|/det|>
READ THESE INSTRUCTIONS FIRST  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 444, 720, 459]]<|/det|>
Write your Centre number, candidate number and name on all the work you hand in.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 461, 320, 475]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 478, 465, 492]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 495, 599, 509]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 511, 380, 525]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 545, 255, 558]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 561, 652, 576]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 594, 904, 623]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 657, 606, 671]]<|/det|>
